509.title: Word, gesture or act intended to insult the modesty of a woman
509.description: Whoever, intending to insult the modesty of any woman, utters any word, makes any sound or gesture, or exhibits any object, shall be punished with simple imprisonment for a term which may extend to three years, and also with fine.

354A.title: Sexual harassment
354A.description: Any man who commits physical contact or advances involving unwelcome and explicit sexual overtures, or demands or requests for sexual favours, shall be guilty of sexual harassment.

503.title: Criminal intimidation
503.description: Whoever threatens another with injury to his person, reputation, or property with intent to cause alarm, commits criminal intimidation.

504.title: Intentional insult with intent to provoke breach of peace
504.description: Whoever intentionally insults and thereby provokes another person, intending or knowing it likely that such provocation will cause him to break the public peace, shall be punished with imprisonment which may extend to two years, or with fine, or both.

506.title: Punishment for criminal intimidation
506.description: Whoever commits the offence of criminal intimidation shall be punished with imprisonment which may extend to two years, or with fine, or both.
